channel.title: Animal Records
channel.description:
[center][b]Animal Records.[/center]
[u][b]Most shocking animal.[/b][/u] The electric eel or [i]paroque[/i] (Electrophorus electricus),from northen South America,can release a shock up to 650 volts to immobilise and kill prey-strong enough to stun an adult human.
[u][b]Fastest insect runners.[/b][/u] Cockroaches can run at up to 5km/h (3 mph),the fastest land speed in the insect world.This is amazingly fast.Scaled up to human size,it would be like running at 320km/h (200mph)
[u][b]Fastest land animal.[/b][/u] The cheetah (Acinonyx jubatus)can move faster than any other creature on dry land.In three seconds,from a standing start,it can reach a speed of around 96km/h (60mph)
[u][b]Longest insect.[/b][/u] The world's longest insect is Pharnacia kirbyi,a stick insect from Borneo.Its body is up to 33cm (13in)long,and its 54.6cm(21,1.2 in) legs are so long that they can get tangled when it sheds its skin.
If there is any questions about animal recoreds,please feel free to comment.
Thank you for your time.

@supernovadelta wrote:

[center][b]Animal Records.[/center]

Most shocking animal.
The electric eel or paroque (Electrophorus electricus),from northen South America,can release a shock up to 650 volts to immobilise and kill prey-strong enough to stun an adult human.

Fastest insect runners.
Cockroaches can run at up to 5km/h (3 mph),the fastest land speed in the insect world.This is amazingly fast.Scaled up to human size,it would be like running at 320km/h (200mph)

Fastest land animal.
The cheetah (Acinonyx jubatus)can move faster than any other creature on dry land.In three seconds,from a standing start,it can reach a speed of around 96km/h (60mph)

Longest insect.
The world’s longest insect is Pharnacia kirbyi,a stick insect from Borneo.Its body is up to 33cm (13in)long,and its 54.6cm(21,1.2 in) legs are so long that they can get tangled when it sheds its skin.
